item.title: 2024 National K-12: Does a Higher Rating Lead to a Higher Standing?
item.description: Statistics of 2024 National K-12 Grades Championship https://www.uschess.org/results/2024/k12/ Over 2,500 contestants from 43 states participated in the 2024 National K-12 Grades Championship The 2024 National K-12 Grades Championship attracted a total of 2,679 participants from 43 states. There are over 1,000 participants from New York, followed by Virginia (250 participants) and New Jersey (218 participants). Fourth grade (age 9) is the most competitive, with nearly 350 participants. Grades 3, 4, and 5 have the highest number of participants, while Grade K has the fewest.
